name: easy-hotel-blocks
description: Example block scaffolded with Create Block tool.
author: The WordPress Contributors

scripts.build: npm run build:accomodationgrid && npm run build:searchform && npm run build:bookingform && npm run build:accomodationGallery && npm run build:accomodationInfo && npm run build:checkInOutTimes && npm run build:availabilityCalendars && npm run build:accomodationSlider
scripts.start: wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodationgrid/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodationgrid/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/searchform/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/searchform/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/bookingform/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/bookingform/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodationGallery/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodationGallery/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodationInfo/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodationInfo/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/checkInOutTimes/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/checkInOutTimes/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/availabilityCalendars/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/availabilityCalendars/build && wp-scripts start --blocks-manifest --webpack-src-dir=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodationSlider/src --output-path=public/includes/gutenberg/blocks/accomodationSlider/build
